task_10_in_progress.status: initial PR created - enum tests done, navigation tests next
task_10_in_progress.notes: Draft PR created with 10 tests for pure enum logic (no new deps). Next expansion: navigation state tests (next_task, prev_task, toggle_focus, toggle_detail, history_next etc.) which need App construction. App::new() calls SpoolContext::discover() which finds .spool in cwd. SpoolContext::new(path) is public - can construct directly with a temp dir. Could add a #[cfg(test)] pub fn new_with_context(ctx, tasks, streams) helper to App to enable isolated tests.

notes: CI does not run on Repo Assist PRs - GitHub Actions cannot trigger CI workflows on PRs it creates (known infrastructure limitation). PR #33 has dirty merge conflict (human PR). All 3 Repo Assist PRs (#41 fix, #42 deps, new tests PR) are open drafts awaiting maintainer review. Task 8 (release): wait for PRs to merge. Next run: confirm PR number for tests PR, look for new issues/PRs, expand navigation state tests if improvement PR merges.
